name: Arcane Nails
description: You summon several 1d4 arcane shards that all strike a creature within a short (10 unit) distance that fails a defense check of 5. For each shard you summon, deal 2 aetheric damage.
charge: You summon an additional 1d4 shards. When you roll a 6 or higher for the number of shards, the target also gains the bleeding condition.
